sentences.en: At ease, Sergeant. This is completely informal.
sentences.cn: 稍息，中士。这完全是很随意的。

sentences.en: Dress at the party was informal, with no neckties or fancy dresses.
sentences.cn: 晚会上人们的服装很随意, 不打领带,也没穿高档的西服.

sentences.en: Each course comprises 10-12 informal weekly meetings.
sentences.cn: 每门课程都包括10至12次每周一次的非正式讨论会。
吃午饭时可以穿休闲服。

sentences.en: His friend was less good-looking, but a lot more informal and relaxed.
sentences.cn: 他的朋友没那么英俊，却随意、放松得多。

sentences.en: Holmes used an informal, chatty tone in his essays.
sentences.cn: 霍姆斯在文章中语气轻松随便.
她不拘礼节，让人耳目一新。

sentences.en: Sometimes formal English and informal English are undistinguished.
sentences.cn: 有时候正式英语与非正式英语很难分清.

sentences.en: Sometimes formal English and informal English must be carefully distinguished.
sentences.cn: 有时候正式英语与非正式英语要十分小心地加以区分.

sentences.en: The atmosphere at work is fairly informal.
The garden has an informal feel to soften the architectural lines of the conservatory.
sentences.cn: 花园有一种随意的风格，从而使温室的建筑轮廓显得柔和了。

sentences.en: The house has an informal atmosphere.
sentences.cn: 房间里有一种轻松随意的氛围。

sentences.en: The restaurant is informal, stylish and extremely good value.
sentences.cn: 这家餐厅氛围轻松，装修雅致，而且价格非常公道。

sentences.en: The two groups met for informal talks.
sentences.cn: 两个团体会面举行非正式会谈。

sentences.en: The two leaders will retire to Camp David for informal discussions.
sentences.cn: 这两位领导人将去戴维营进行非正式会谈。

sentences.en: What struck me about the firm is how genuinely friendly and informal it is.
sentences.cn: 该公司的真诚、友好和不拘小节深深打动了我。
